com.tsgrp.migration.node.content

Class FileContentReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tsgrp.migration.node.content.FileContentReader

  • public class FileContentReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Create a Content object and populate it from a local file.

    In general, this class's methods wrap any IOExceptions in ContentExceptions, since the calling Source will not do anything except "fail" when something goes wrong here.

        inFile -

      • readFile

        public Content readFile(java.io.File inFile,
                        java.lang.Boolean isInFileTemporary)
                 throws ContentException
        Create and return a Content object from the given File.
        Parameters:
        inFile - Input file to create content from
        isInFileTemporary - Boolean that tells OpenMigrate that the content is in a temporary file, which is used to trigger deleteOnExit when the migration is over
        Returns:
        Content
        Throws:
        ContentException - If file doesn't exist or some other low-level error occurs
